text: Club Sol de América is a Paraguayan sports club, mostly known for its football team. The club is located in Barrio Obrero, Paraguay, and it was founded in 1909. Sol de America have won the Paraguayan First Division title on two occasions, in 1986 and then again in 1991. They also have a strong basketball team and an athletics department. ==Other websites== * Paraguayan Soccer Info Category:1900s establishments in South America Category:1909 establishments Category:South American football clubs Category:Football in Paraguay Category:Sports organizations of Paraguay
title: Club Sol de América
